data.name: A2Be - A Science-Fiction Narrative
data.detailed_description:
A2Be is a light point-and-click sci-fi narrative, set in a future where teleportation has revolutionized everything we know and do. Make choices, and experience a unique story.

THE GATEWAY THAT SAVED THE WORLD

In the far future, the invention of instantaneous and waste-free transportation has brought a new age of utopia for humanity.

Closing the distance between us and diminishing ecological burdens to globalization, this new technology will bring the world to our fingertips and open the doors to the infinite.

Explore this brave vision of our destiny, and see its wonders.

JOURNEY THROUGHWARD

Life in the 23rd century is a marvel to behold, with convenience and delight unimaginable by earlier minds.

Janus Labs has revolutionized the world, bringing a new age of productivity and satisfaction. Experience a life unbound by the physical dimension, and truest freedom.

Discovering who you are in this new, paradisic utopia is as simple as deciding where you would like to be.

SECRETS KEPT WITHIN US

There is a secret that keeps the world from falling apart. It is known to few, and kept for all's sake.

Look for the seams in your existence, and you may understand your composition. Peer too closely at these fractures, and the tapestry of your identity may undo.

It will be your choice to hold, or cast the weight of gained knowledge. Once made aware, we cannot forget.

data.short_description: In the far future, the invention of instantaneous and waste-free transportation has brought a new age of utopia for humanity. Explore this brave vision of our destiny, and see its many wonders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 4 GB Processor: Pentium(R) Dual-Core
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
